SmartComponent.name: RSConnectDIOToSnap7
SmartComponent.description: Allow to connect Robot with real or simulated S7 PLC using Sharp7(Snap7).

DynamicProperty.name: PLC_Addr
DynamicProperty.description: IP Address of PLC IPV4. For PLCSim, you have to run NetToPLCSim and enter PC IP.

DynamicProperty.name: PLC_Rack
DynamicProperty.description: S7_300 Rack=0 S7_400 See HW Config S7_12xx/15xx Rack=0

DynamicProperty.name: PLC_Slot
DynamicProperty.description: S7_300 Slot=2 S7_400 See HW Config S7_12xx/15xx Slot=1

DynamicProperty.name: DI_Number
DynamicProperty.description: Number of DI to connect to in Station Logic. Change it to get DI appearing.

DynamicProperty.name: DO_Number
DynamicProperty.description: Number of DO to connect to in Station Logic. Change it to get DO appearing.

DynamicProperty.name: DI_Address_0
DynamicProperty.description: You can use: Ax.y Qx.y Mx.y DBx.DBXy.z

DynamicProperty.name: DO_Address_0
DynamicProperty.description: You can use: Ex.y Ix.y Mx.y DBx.DBXy.z

IOSignal.name: Read
IOSignal.description: Read DI on PLC one time. In simulation running, they are read continuously.
